info_bar_idle_wild: GET {WILD_SYMBOL} WITH EVERY GOLD FRAMED SYMBOL!
info_bar_idle_scatter: {SCATTERS_COUNT} OR MORE {SCATTER_SYMBOL} TRIGGER {FS_COUNT} OR MORE FREE SPINS
get_3_guaranteed_scatters: GET 3 GUARANTEED SCATTERS AND 10 BONUS SPINS
buy_feature_instructions: EACH BONUS SPIN WILL PLAY AT SELECTED BET OF {BET}
slide_or_tap: SLIDE TO SELECT / TAP TO EDIT
symbol_payout_instructions: • WILD SYMBOL substitutes for all symbols except SCATTER SYMBOL.║║• GOLD FRAMED SYMBOLS appear on reels 3 and 4 only.
gold_framed_symbols_instructions: • During any spin, some symbols (excluding WILD SYMBOL and SCATTER SYMBOL) in reels 3 and/or 4 may appear as GOLD FRAMED symbols.║║• At every new round after the new symbols have cascaded down, any GOLD FRAMED SYMBOL(S) that is involved in a win in the previous round will be transformed into WILD SYMBOL(S).
multiplier_instructions: • At the start of any main game spin, the win multiplier is x1.║║• During any spin, if there are one or more winning symbols on the reels, after wins are paid and the new symbols have cascaded down, the win multiplier will be doubled.║║• The maximum win multiplier is 1024.
free_spins_feature_instructions: • 3 SCATTER SYMBOLS appearing anywhere will trigger the FREE SPINS FEATURE with 10 FREE SPINS. Each additional SCATTER SYMBOL will trigger 2 more FREE SPINS║║• At the start of every free spin, the win multiplier begins at x8.║║• During any free spin, if there are one or more winning symbols on the reels, after wins are payed and the new symbols have cascaded down, the win multiplier will be doubled.║║• FREE SPINS can be retriggered.
maximal_win_instructions: • The maximum win amount is 5000x of selected bet amount, which is {PAYOUT}.
win_3600_ways_instructions: • Bet ways win if the winning symbols are in succession from the leftmost reel to the right.
win_3600_ways_instructions_part_2: • The total number of winning bet ways for each symbol is calculated by multiplying the count of adjacent winning symbols on each reel from the leftmost to the right.║║• The winning symbol payout is multiplied by the number of winning bet ways.
win_3600_ways_instructions_part_3: • After the payout of every round, all winning symbols explode, and the symbols above them cascade down to form a new round.║║• Additional winning combinations will be tallied in every round until no more winning combinations can be tallied.║║• All wins shown in cash.
